description: Returns the total distance the entity has moved horizontally in meters (since the entity was last loaded, not necessarily since it was originally created). Distance can be affected by status flags such as `is_baby` or `on_fire`.

generated_doNotEdit.title: Modified Distance Moved
generated_doNotEdit.description: Returns the total distance the entity has moved horizontally in meters (since the entity was last loaded, not necessarily since it was originally created) modified along the way by status flags such as is_baby or on_fire.
